liquidity.title: Liquidity Pool
liquidity.description: Provide liquidity and earn trading fees from wDOI/USDT trading across multiple platforms.
liquidity.uniswapDescription: Provide liquidity to the official wDOI/USDT pool on Uniswap V3 and earn 0.3% fees from all trades.
howItWorksSteps: Add equal value of wDOI and USDT tokens
Receive LP tokens representing your pool share
Earn 0.3% fee from all trades proportional to your share
Remove liquidity anytime by burning LP tokens
importantNotesItems: Impermanent Loss: Value may fluctuate vs holding tokens
Price Impact: Large amounts may affect pool ratios
Slippage: Price may change during transaction
Gas Fees: Each transaction requires ETH for gas
